rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {MNE1010}
For COURSE_CODE IN {4618} Do true Otherwise Permission required
(Must have passed 1 units in {MNE1010} or  Must have passed 2 units in {MNE2010, MNE2030})

description: The unit provides a detailed understanding of surface mining processes and systems and their key drivers in modern open-cut and quarry operations. This includes the consideration of stability, equipment and technology materials handling and transport systems, tailings storage facilities, waste dumps, heap-leach pads and stockpiles. For each of the surface mining systems covered, core risk identification and mitigation is considered.
